short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay focused as if under a magical spell.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FocusPocus is an extension designed to help you maintain focus on your studies by blocking access to distracting websites during focus mode.

When you activate focus mode, FocusPocus springs into action, blocking access to custom websites chosen by you, which may tempt and distract you while you're studying.

With FocusPocus, you can create a distraction-free study environment, allowing you to maximize your time and concentration. Focus on your tasks without interruptions, increasing your productivity and achieving your academic goals.

Take control of your time and stay on track with FocusPocus.
